synthesis_conditions.equipment: two-electrode system (platinum plates, 6 × 15 mm2) and a U-shaped glass tube (11 mm in diameter)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Electrolyzed at 2 μA, in air. NO3- must be added only to the salt bridge.
